name: Laser Operator
description:
:How to play: 

Click the [left mouse button] to shoot

You can also hold down the [left mouse button] to shoot

Use [arrow keys] to move from side to side

Hit multiple asteroids/meteors with one shot to get extra points

Please leave suggestions about what should be changed

:Note:

I have not made art for this yet, this is a prototype.  Please treat it as such.

This is not the finished game I will be updating this as I work on it.

Thankyou
